entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
